verses.verse: And it came <WG1096> about soon afterwards, <WG1722> <WG2517> that He [began] going <WG1353> about <WG1353> from one city <WG4172> and village <WG2968> to another, <WG2596> proclaiming <WG2784> and preaching <WG2097> the kingdom <WG932> of God; <WG2316> and the twelve <WG1427> were with Him,

and [also] some <WG5100> women <WG1135> who <WG3739> had been <WG1510> healed <WG2323> of evil <WG4190> spirits <WG4151> and sicknesses: <WG769> Mary <WG3137> who was called <WG2564> Magdalene, <WG3094> from whom <WG3739> seven <WG2033> demons <WG1140> had gone <WG1831> out,

and Joanna <WG2489> the wife <WG1135> of Chuza, <WG5529> Herod's steward, <WG2012> and Susanna, <WG4677> and many <WG4183> others <WG2087> who <WG3748> were contributing <WG1247> to their support <WG1247> out of their private <WG5225> means. <WG5225>

And when a great <WG4183> multitude <WG3793> were coming <WG4896> together, <WG4896> and those <WG3588> from the various <WG2596> cities <WG4172> were journeying <WG1975> to Him, He spoke <WG3004> by way <WG1223> of a parable: <WG3850>

"The sower <WG4687> went <WG1831> out to sow <WG4687> his seed; <WG4703> and as he sowed, <WG4687> some <WG3739> <WG3303> fell <WG4098> beside <WG3844> the road; <WG3598> and it was trampled <WG2662> under <WG2662> foot, <WG2662> and the birds <WG4071> of the air <WG3772> ate <WG2719> it up.

"And other <WG2087> [seed] fell <WG2667> on rocky <WG4073> [soil,] and as soon as it grew <WG5453> up, it withered <WG3583> away, <WG3583> because <WG1223> it had <WG2192> no <WG3361> moisture. <WG2429>

"And other <WG2087> [seed] fell <WG4098> into the good <WG18> soil, <WG1093> and grew <WG5453> up, and produced <WG4160> a crop <WG2590> a hundred <WG1542> times <WG1542> as great. <WG1542>" As He said <WG3004> these <WG3778> things, <WG3778> He would call <WG5455> out, "He who has <WG2192> ears <WG3775> to hear, <WG191> let him hear. <WG191>"

"Now <WG1161> the parable <WG3850> is this: <WG3778> the seed <WG4703> is the word <WG3056> of God. <WG2316>

And they were fearful <WG5399> and amazed, <WG2296> saying <WG3004> to one <WG240> another, <WG240> "Who <WG5101> then <WG686> is this, <WG3778> that He commands <WG2004> even <WG2532> the winds <WG417> and the water, <WG5204> and they obey <WG5219> Him?"

I beg <WG1189> You, do not torment <WG928> me."

For He had been commanding <WG3853> the unclean <WG169> spirit <WG4151> to come <WG1831> out of the man. <WG444> For it had seized <WG4884> him many <WG4183> times; <WG5550> and he was bound <WG1195> with chains <WG254> and shackles <WG3976> and kept <WG5442> under <WG5442> guard; <WG5442> and [yet] he would burst <WG1284> his fetters <WG1199> and be driven <WG1643> by the demon <WG1140> into the desert. <WG2048>

And when He had come <WG2064> to the house, <WG3614> He did not allow <WG863> anyone <WG5100> to enter <WG1525> with Him, except <WG1508> Peter <WG4074> and John <WG2491> and James, <WG2385> and the girl's father <WG3962> and mother. <WG3384>
